name: FrostFire Fighters
description:
A 3D fighting game inspired by the classic arena fighters like Tekken, this is Goose Eats God's submission for the TAGD fall 2019 semester game jam.

You and one other friend compete in local multiplayer as two soldiers of fire and ice.  Controls are simple, rounds are quick. Grab a two Xbox controllers, sit down on the couch, and enjoy!

Combos - Hit light attack followed by a heavy attack to trigger a combo chain that executes the move faster.

How to run

  • Download and Unzip the file, then go to...
  • WindowsNoEditor\GEG2019FGame\Binaries\Win64\GEG2019FGame-Win64-Shipping.exe
Note: GEG2019FGame is a FOLDER, clicking on GEG2019FGame.exe in that file location will not work

Upcoming Functionality

  • Special Attacks
  • Guard
  • Jump
  • More Combos

Development Team

  • Anthony Nguyen - Coding, Level Design, Gameplay Scripting
  • Austin Nutt - 3D Modelling & Animation
  • Beatrice Wells - UI/UX, Texturing
